name: Mountain Bell Ski
description:
Ski down the mountains, avoid the obstacles, and retrieve all bells. (It was supposed to be an elf but I can't draw so it's a blob).

Collect power-ups to increase max speed (boost) or decrease the clock (time).

Controls:

Left or A: Steer Left

Right or D: Steer Right

R: Restart Level

F: Toggle Fullscreen

Made by Danidre in 24 hours for the Toast2021 Game Jam!
